metadata.title: CVE-2021-3659 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: [NULL pointer dereference in llsec_key_alloc() in net/mac802154/llsec.c]

criterions.comment: linux package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.11.0-18.19').
